body_html: It'd probably be possible to fix this up by moving this file https://github.com/benoitsteiner/tensorflow/blob/e1f44d854e9e6db6ce1f7c70b81d0fef03e4a932/tensorflow/core/platform/posix/cuda_libdevice_path.cc to ../default (and modifying the necessary paths in the build config).

body: It'd probably be possible to fix this up by moving this file https://github.com/benoitsteiner/tensorflow/blob/e1f44d854e9e6db6ce1f7c70b81d0fef03e4a932/tensorflow/core/platform/posix/cuda_libdevice_path.cc to `../default` (and modifying the necessary paths in the build config).
